item.title: GCP - preparing for your cloud architect journey
item.author: celine
item.description: 2023-08-05 Yeah, 考過了！ 接下來要準備 OCPJP SE 11 VPC Projects, networks, subnetworks A project Associates objects and servicing with billing Contains networks A network 3 VPC network types Default Every project One subnet per region Default firewall rules Auto Mode Default network One subnet per region Regional IP allocation Fixed /20 subnetwork per region Expandable up to /16 Custom Mode No default subnets created Full control of IP ranges Regional IP allocation Expandable to IP ranges you specify Expand subnets without re-creating instances Cannot overlap with other subnets
